abstract: AES Corp's West Virginia wind farm uses big containers of batteries to make electricity from 61 turbines more useful to the power grid; smoothing output and storing electricity by wind production will increase in importance as states require that more electricity come from renewable sources.
snippet: A wind farm in West Virginia has been using big containers of batteries to make the electricity from 61 turbines more useful to the power grid.
lead_paragraph: A wind farm in West Virginia has been using big containers of batteries to make the electricity from 61 turbines more useful to the power grid.

headline.main: Batteries at a Wind Farm Help Control Output
headline.print_headline: Batteries at a Wind Farm Help Control Output
headline.seo: Batteries on a Wind Farm Help Control Power Output
